title: FS T206 Magee Old Mill SGC 3 -- SOLD
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: FS T206 Magee Old Mill SGC 3 -- SOLD
posts.post_content:
Last night in the Heritage Auction a T206 Magee Old Mill in PSA 4 sold for $10,224 including buyers premium.

I have a Magee Old Mill graded SGC 3 I am willing to part with.  If anyone (perhaps the underbidder) has interest please contact me via PM or at [url]Kardboys@yahoo.com[/url]  I'm sure we can make a reasonable deal.

Thanks for considering.

Bob I.

The card has sold.

I'm not sure if it's the same one but the PSA 4 in Heritage looks very similar to
this Beckett Authentic Magee Old Mill that sold in 2008.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=504932&d=1646053670[/IMG]

Well, I always wondered if you could round trimmed corners a bit and have a shot at turning an A into an # at PSA. Looks like I have my answer. 

I think I remember the OP's card and it looks really nice. Good luck with the sale!

Borders look very similar, but I cannot tell with that poor picture quality. Could be, maybe not. 

Either way , that seems like a strong price for that card??
Ok that's all well and good but this is the BST I think those comments are more suited for the homepage section.   I'm not looking to sell a card I don't own.   Thanks.
